name: Momento Temporis: Light from the Deep
description: All alone, Hania sets out on a journey to find the answers to her past across this uncharted, perilous and magical world.
minimum_requirements: 最低: OS: Windows XP メモリー: 1 GB RAM グラフィック: OpenGL 2.1 or OpenGL ES 2-capable graphics card and drivers ストレージ: 30 MB 利用可能

reviews.review_text: This is an Early Access game that decided to pretend it was complete. It's not, and it straight up tells you so after a certain point. Decent mechanics, solid execution, a good idea behind it all, but I don't give a thumbs up to dishonesty.

The mechanics are satisfying and the art is nice (except for the main character). I just hope the missing content gets added in a timely fashion, as I'd love to actually play through the complete game.
